CssProperty.name: transform-style
CssProperty.description: Defines how nested elements are rendered in 3D space.

entry.description: All children of this element are rendered flattened into the 2D plane of the element.
Flattening is not performed, so children maintain their position in 3D space.

CssProperty.name: perspective
CssProperty.description: Applies the same transform as the perspective(<number>) transform function, except that it applies only to the positioned or transformed children of the element, not to the transform on the element itself.

CssProperty.name: perspective-origin
CssProperty.description: Establishes the origin for the perspective property. It effectively sets the X and Y position at which the viewer appears to be looking at the children of the element.

CssProperty.name: backface-visibility
CssProperty.description: Determines whether or not the 'back' side of a transformed element is visible when facing the viewer. With an identity transform, the front side of an element faces the viewer.
